Introduction
This topic contains information about osteomyelitis, including
historical evaluations for osteomyelitis
assigning historical evaluations for osteomyelitis
reasons to discontinue a historical evaluation for osteomyelitis
constitutional symptoms of osteomyelitis
criteria for a 100-percent osteomyelitis evaluation
active osteomyelitis associated with noncompensable amputation
, and
application of the amputation rule to evaluations for osteomyelitis
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D - Osteomyelitis
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
